Headline: #87 87th buses Temporary Reroute at 87th/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Western, 83rd, California and 8th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Western, 83rd, California and 8th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
